name: nordcloudproblem
description: This is an interpretation of the problem proposed by Nordcloud to calculate the most suitabe 'link station' for any given point. This link station should have the highest possible power as per specifications.

scripts.start: npm run compile && cross-env NODE_ENV=dev node ./babel_compiled/main.js
scripts.compile: echo using babel to compile code... &&  babel src --out-dir babel_compiled
